targets.query: SELECT mean("n_containers_running") FROM "docker" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("n_containers_running") FROM "docker" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("n_containers_running") FROM "docker" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("queryReq"), 1s) FROM "httpd" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("serverError"), 1s) FROM "httpd" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("clientError"), 1s) FROM "httpd" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("pointsWrittenFail"), 1s) FROM "httpd" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("pointsWrittenOK"), 1s) FROM "httpd" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("Sys") FROM "runtime" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("numMeasurements") FROM "database" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("numMeasurements") FROM "database" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

list.name: container
list.query: show tag values with key = "container_name" where host = '$host'
